10241.name: Last Caller Barring
10241.shortDescription: Bars the last caller from calling again

10242.shortDescription: Never forget an important event again

10243.name: Ring Back
10243.shortDescription: Press a button to get a call when the line's free.

10244.name: Three Way Calling
10244.shortDescription: Make plans with two friends at once.

10609.name: SuperSafe Boost
description: Award-winning online protection for your mobile, tablet and computer. Makes sure you're secure when banking. Plus detects, blocks and removes viruses on your device.
features: Online Banking Protection - an additional layer of protection tells you when it's safe to bank online
Anti-virus Protection - detects, blocks and removes viruses to minimise threats to your device
Identity Protection - protects your passwords and private data when surfing the web
Multi-device - protects your mobiles, tablets and computers, both in and out of the home
10609.benefitsTitle: Are you sure you want to remove your award winning online protection?
10609.benefitsDescription: Currently you're able to protect up to 8 of your devices to ensure you benefit from secure online banking, virus and identity protection on the web. Whether you're using your tablet, mobile or laptop, you'll have piece of mind that your experience is more secure.

10616.name: Unlimited UK Calls
description: Unlimited calls to UK mobiles and landlines 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. If you use your home phone for more than an hour a month, then it'll be cheaper for you to take our Unlimited UK Calls Boost.
features: Unlimited calls to UK mobiles and landlines

Call any time of day, 
on weekdays or weekends
No long term commitment - keep as long as you want, remove at any time
10616.benefitsTitle: Are you sure you want to start paying Full Price for your calls?
10616.benefitsDescription: Currently you'll be able to make UNLIMITED calls to both UK mobiles and landlines any time of the day. If you remove your inclusive calls, you'll be charged full price for each call which is 12.5p a minute, plus an 18p connection fee.

You'll also be entitled to discounted rates to all other destinations. If you remove your inclusive calls you'll be charged full price for each call which can be up to Â£1 per minute.
